scripts.build-css: sass src/scss/main.scss public/css/main.css --no-source-map && cleancss public/css/main.css -o public/css/main.css
scripts.preinstall: rm -rf public && mkdir -p public/css/fonts && mkdir -p public/image && mkdir -p public/js
scripts.build: npm run build-css && cp -r src/html/* public/ && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/fonts/* public/css/fonts && cp -r src/js/* public/js/ && cp -r src/image/* public/image/
